headline: Here is Why the Southern Company (SO) is a Good Option to Invest in the Nuclear Space
summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is included among the 13 Best Nuclear Power Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. The Southern Company (NYSE:SO), through its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity. The company has also carved out a leading role in the American nuclear energy sector and oversees eight reactors at three different […]
